name: Button
description: A reusable button component with different variants and states

props.name: onClick
props.description: Function to call when the button is clicked

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the button

state.name: isHovered
state.description: Whether the button is currently being hovered

state.name: isFocused
state.description: Whether the button is currently focused

functionality: The button should handle click events and show different styles based on the variant and size props. It should also have hover and focus states.
styling: Use Tailwind CSS for styling. The primary variant should be blue, the secondary variant should be gray, the outline variant should have a border with no background, and the ghost variant should have no background or border.
